title: Ocean Weak, No Points?
body:
Yesterday and the day before that, I looked on the Ocean Weak site and it said I had 3 points.

Today, I looked on the site and it said I had no points.
What?

This is annoying... I want to vote for what the statue should be. But how, if all my points have been reset?

Riot, please look into this problem.

replies.body:
I think it might just be a bit delayed, that is, your points weren't reset, but it's just drawing that from its most recent memory of you, which might not have had the three points.

Try again later and see if that's still so.
